SEO.title: Faux Fur Rune Coat - PLANT® x Elden Ring
SEO.description: Brown faux fur rune coat. Lined with 'The Lands Between' map and featuring a rune patch on the back.

product.name: Faux Fur Runes Coat
product.label: pre-order
product.mainDescription: ECOPEL faux fur coat in brown. Lined with The Lands Between map all-over print. Featuring a faux leather embossed Rune patch on the back.

content.text: This is a naturally oversized garment, take your normal size to achieve the model look.
Size down for a more relaxed fit.
Male model Egon is 185cm tall and wears a Medium.
Female model Anais is 177cm and wears a Medium.

accordions.title: Materials
accordions.description: Faux fur 30% recycled polyester, 70% Acrylic, Made in China (from Ecopel) Sew-on ECO aluminium finish sew-on press studs at center front Recycled PU patch at back 100% cupro lining - print

material.label: OUTER
material.sentence: {{ECOPEL Faux Fur}} 30% Recycled Polyester, 70% Acrylic, made in China (from Ecopel)

content.title: ECOPEL Faux Fur
content.description: ECOPEL is a pioneer in faux fur development, and has more than 15 years of experience in the field. They specialise in creating true to life synthetic fur that feels as warm, comfortable and luxurious as possible.
